name: Faeries and the Wizard
description:
Oh no. You, a mighty wizard at the top of his tower, have made a critical error! You forgot to lock the cages of the captured Faeries you use in your spell reagents! 

Better get to work cleaning up, and don't forget to teach those Fae a lesson!

You can easily go and beat their queen, but where is the glory in that? Do more for a higher score! Be better than your friends and loved ones, and show off at how skilled you are at Wizardry!
